<GENERATOR-INSTRUMENT>ExoMars_NOMAD-SO: ExoMars_NOMAD-SO: The Solar Occultation (SO) channel is the primary occultation spectrometer of the NOMAD instrument onboard the ExoMars / Trace-Gas-Orbiter (TGO) mission. It is a high-resolution (RP 20,000) grating spectrometer coupled with a AOTF filter. It has an instantaneous spectral grasp of  27 cm-1 covering the 2200-5000 cm-1 (2.0 to 4.5 um) spectral region.
